column4: Developed for all-day comfort, the New Balance 928 men’s walking shoe offers industry-leading motion control and superior stability thanks to our ROLLBAR and Walking Strike Path technologies. Add to that ABZORB midfoot cushioning, a seamless Phantom Liner and an odor-resistant treatment and you've got a shoe that can take you from 9 to 5 to whenever.
Leather laces round out the premium classic look.

Developed for all-day comfort, the New Balance 928 men’s walking shoe offers industry-leading motion control and superior stability thanks to our ROLLBAR and Walking Strike Path technologies. Add to that ABZORB midfoot cushioning, a seamless Phantom Liner and an odor-resistant treatment and you've got a shoe that can take you from 9 to 5 to whenever.

Take walking to the next level with total comfort. The New Balance 847v3 men’s walking shoe features a full-length ABZORB ultra-responsive midsole with a PU insert and strobe board, providing the best in step and all day comfort, while the ROLLBAR keeps you locked and loaded.

Beat foot fatigue and discourage joint pain by wearing the right shoes for the job. The 577 all-leather walking shoe pairs premium cushioning with superior durability, creating an excellent choice for everyone from the moderate-paced fitness walker to health care providers who spend hours on their feet.

Designed for superior support throughout many years of use, the men’s 978 trail walker also features NDurance rubber in the sole for maximum durability in high-wear areas and classic C-Cap midsole support.

Beat foot fatigue and discourage joint pain by wearing the right shoes for the job. The 577 all-leather walking shoe pairs premium cushioning with superior durability, creating an excellent choice for everyone from the moderate-paced fitness walker to health care providers who spend hours on their feet.
Plus, the streamlined silhouette features a metallic N logo for a modern take on classic branding.
Stable and steady wins the race. The New Balance 928 men’s walking shoe features motion control and ROLLBAR stability technologies and ABZORB cushioning for comfort from morning till midnight.

In addition to tried-and-true ROLLBAR® technology, the New Balance 813 offers the supportive cushioning of a lightweight foam midsole along with the plush comfort of a soft collar and supple leather upper.
Take the path less traveled with confidence and comfort in the new waterproof 1400v1 hiking boot, the boot that feels like a shoe.

Developed for all-day comfort, the New Balance 928 men’s walking shoe offers industry-leading motion control and superior stability thanks to our ROLLBAR and Walking Strike Path technologies. Add to that ABZORB midfoot cushioning, a seamless Phantom Liner and an odor-resistant treatment and you've got a shoe that can take you from 9 to 5 to whenever.

The 1865 is designed with advanced technology that reinvents fitness walking. Devote all your energy to your walks with the lightweight Rapid Rebound midsole. No-sew materials and FantomFit overlays provide a secure and comfortable fit.
The 840v2 also features a leather upper for a secure, yet flexible, fit. Also, NDurance rubber compound for extra durability in high wear areas.

Developed for all-day comfort, the New Balance 928 men’s walking shoe offers industry-leading motion control and superior stability thanks to our ROLLBAR and Walking Strike Path technologies. Add to that ABZORB midfoot cushioning, a seamless Phantom Liner and an odor-resistant treatment and you've got a shoe that can take you from 9 to 5 to whenever.
In addition to ROLLBAR technology, this walking shoe features an extra-long hook-and-loop closure perfect for those on their feet day after day.
Men's slip-on shoe features lightweight cushion profile with the perfect blend of foam and compression set with extra midsole support and lugged outsole.
Meant for more than just trail walking, the men's 769 features a lightweight cushioned midsole made from a premium foam blend and lugged outsole.

Stay on your feet in the dependable construction of the New Balance 706v2 Postal walking shoe. This US Postal Service-approved shoe is specially designed to with ROLLBAR® technology, a polyurethane outsole and midsole for long-wearing lightweight comfort and durability, compression-resistant cushioning and a breathable leather upper all ready to go to work when you are.
The 840v2 also features NDurance rubber compound for extra durability in high wear areas.
The men's 365 sneaker has a modern casual athletic design you can wear anywhere. Shoe features a mesh and textile upper and Cush+ technology for ultra-soft and responsive cushioning.
Whether you’re working in the snow or heading into work, the Fresh Foam midsole provides an oh-so-smooth ride.
Meant for more than just trail walking, the men's 669 features a lightweight cushioned midsole made from a premium foam blend and lugged outsole.
Choose your own road, or off-road, in the comfortable and durable 3000v1 trail walker.
